name: Hermi Odle (V)
Lore: 'Baragwin assigned by Jabba to be the palace''s master weaponsmith. Enemy of Pote Snitkin.',
Text: 'Aliens at same and related sites may not have their weapons stolen or be Disarmed, and, while armed with a non-lightsaber, non-[Permanent Weapon] weapon: their weapon destiny draws are +1 and opponent''s [Permanent Weapon] characters are power -1 there.(Errata Text - September 9th, 2009)',
